pages.text: $(#551012)Entry #9 $(br2)I have encountered a peculiar substance in the depths of the Nether, one I have come to call Foulite Dust. This greenish powder seems to originate from the fusion of foul energies and remnants of organic matter.

$(#551012)Its ominous origins are evident in the way it clings to the air, almost as if it possesses a malevolent will of its own. Despite its unsettling nature, I have found Foulite Dust to be an invaluable resource. It is highly flammable, providing much-needed illumination and smelting of other materials. $(br2)Its properties extend beyond simple combustion as well...

$(#551012)I've discovered that, strangely enough, Foulite Dust has a restorative effect on wounds. I have used it to mend my own injuries on more than one occasion, marveling at the way it accelerates healing, even as I question the cost of its use. I must look into this further.
